column4: Tonight is my first night ever trying linux. I tried to install and cannot get past this error: GRUB Loading stage1.5. Grub Loading, please wait... Error 2
Im running a raid with mediashield
you can  Google and find out what error 2 is,  but  the bot stuff might also be useful
ok, ill give it a shot, thanks

someone else Googled for you, when I  told him about this.   stage 2 error 2  2 : Bad file or directory type  This error is returned if a file requested is not a regular file, but something like a symbolic link, directory, or FIFO.
im not really sure what all that means, but thank you
maybe  the  /boot/grub  stuff has been installed in a werid place,   which also means your menu.lst is,   or simpally the  menu.lst entrys aren't detecing your partition properly
im wondering if this has something to do with my raid configuration
http://www.ubuntuforums.org is also good by the way
well it's a Grub error so it's not exactly distro specific and so  ##linux could be useful the general Linux channal
well  I expect it's something to do with how your RAID is set up
